# Merging several sources

## Working Environment 

```{r packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(foreign)
library(dplyr)
library(readstata13)
library(countrycode)
setwd("~/Dropbox/01Research Project/Budget-Vdem")
#getwd()
```


## Merge Data

```{r, warning=FALSE}
GSRE <- read.dta13('GSRE_extended_1_0.dta')
VDEM <- read.dta13('V-Dem-DS-CY+Others-v6.2.dta')
colnames(VDEM)[10] <- "cowcode"
#This keeps all points
mydata <-  merge(GSRE, VDEM, by=c("cowcode","year"), all.x = TRUE, all.y = TRUE) 
```
